verses.verse: He who is wounded in the stones, <S%H6481><s%> or has his privy member <S%H8212><s%> cut off, <S%H3772><s%> shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

A bastard <S%H4464><s%> shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> even to the tenth <S%H6224><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall none of his enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

An Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> or a Moabite <S%H4125><s%> shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> even to the tenth <S%H6224><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall none belonging to them enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%>

because <S%H1697><s%> they didn't <S%H6923><s%> meet you with bread <S%H3899><s%> and with water <S%H4325><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> when you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and because they hired <S%H7936><s%> against you Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> from Pethor <S%H6604><s%> of Mesopotamia, <S%H763><s%> to curse you. <S%H7043><s%>

Nevertheless Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> wouldn't <S%H14><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to Balaam; <S%H1109><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> the curse <S%H7045><s%> into a blessing <S%H1293><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> because Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> loved you. <S%H157><s%>
You shall not seek <S%H1875><s%> their peace <S%H7965><s%> nor their prosperity <S%H2896><s%> all your days <S%H3117><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

You shall not abhor <S%H8581><s%> an Edomite; <S%H130><s%> for he is your brother: <S%H251><s%> you shall not abhor <S%H8581><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> because you lived as a foreigner <S%H1616><s%> in his land. <S%H776><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of the third <S%H7992><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> who are born <S%H3205><s%> to them shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
When you go forth <S%H3318><s%> in camp <S%H4264><s%> against your enemies, <S%H341><s%> then you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> yourselves from every evil <S%H7451><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

If there is among you any man <S%H376><s%> who is not clean <S%H2889><s%> by reason of that which happens <S%H7137><s%> him by night, <S%H3915><s%> then shall he go <S%H3318><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp. <S%H4264><s%> He shall not come <S%H935><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%>

but it shall be, <S%H6153><s%> when evening comes on, <S%H6437><s%> he shall bathe <S%H7364><s%> himself in water; <S%H4325><s%> and when the sun <S%H8121><s%> is down, <S%H935><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
You shall have a place also <S%H3027><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> where you shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> abroad: <S%H2351><s%>

and you shall have a paddle <S%H3489><s%> among your weapons; <S%H240><s%> and it shall be, <S%H3427><s%> when you sit down abroad, <S%H2351><s%> you shall dig <S%H2658><s%> therewith, <S%H7725><s%> and shall turn back and cover <S%H3680><s%> that which comes from you: <S%H6627><s%>

for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> walks <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of your camp, <S%H4264><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> you, <S%H5414><s%> and to give up your enemies <S%H341><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H4264><s%> therefore your camp shall be holy, <S%H6918><s%> that he may not see <S%H7200><s%> an unclean <S%H6172><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> in you, <S%H7725><s%> and turn away from you. <S%H310><s%>
You shall not deliver <S%H5462><s%> to his master <S%H113><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> who is escaped <S%H5337><s%> from his master to you: <S%H113><s%>

he shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> with you, <S%H7130><s%> in the midst of you, <S%H4725><s%> in the place which he shall choose <S%H977><s%> within one <S%H259><s%> of your gates, <S%H8179><s%> where it pleases him best: <S%H2896><s%> you shall not oppress him. <S%H3238><s%>
There shall be no prostitute <S%H6948><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither shall there be a sodomite <S%H6945><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

You shall not bring <S%H935><s%> the hire <S%H868><s%> of a prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> or the wages <S%H4242><s%> of a dog, <S%H3611><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for any vow: <S%H5088><s%> for even both <S%H8147><s%> these are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall not lend on interest <S%H5391><s%> to your brother; <S%H251><s%> interest <S%H5391><s%> of money, <S%H3701><s%> interest <S%H5392><s%> of food, <S%H400><s%> interest <S%H5392><s%> of anything <S%H1697><s%> that is lent on interest: <S%H5391><s%>

to a foreigner <S%H5237><s%> you may lend on interest; <S%H5391><s%> but to your brother <S%H251><s%> you shall not lend on interest, <S%H5391><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all that you put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to, <S%H776><s%> in the land where you go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

When you shall vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> you shall not be slack <S%H309><s%> to pay <S%H7999><s%> it: <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H1875><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> it of you; <S%H2399><s%> and it would be sin in you.
But if you shall forbear <S%H2308><s%> to vow, <S%H5087><s%> it shall be no sin in you. <S%H2399><s%>

That which is gone out <S%H4161><s%> of your lips <S%H8193><s%> you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> and do; <S%H6213><s%> according as you have vowed <S%H5087><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> a freewill offering, <S%H5071><s%> which you have promised <S%H1696><s%> with your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

When you come <S%H935><s%> into your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> then you may eat <S%H398><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%> your fill <S%H7648><s%> at your own pleasure; <S%H5315><s%> but you shall not put <S%H5414><s%> any in your vessel. <S%H3627><s%>

When you come <S%H935><s%> into your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s standing grain, <S%H7054><s%> then you may pluck <S%H6998><s%> the ears <S%H4425><s%> with your hand; <S%H3027><s%> but you shall not move <S%H5130><s%> a sickle <S%H2770><s%> to your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s standing grain. <S%H7054><s%>
